      • get

        public java.util.List<Material> get(Constraint<MaterialColumn>... constraints)
                             throws MysqlDataAccessException
        Returns the materials in the data storage. The results can be constrained using the provided constraints.
        Specified by:
        get in interface MaterialDAO
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The resulting materials.
        Throws:
        MysqlDataAccessException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

        Specified by:
